cards.name: See the Future
cards.instruction: Get a sneak-peak into the future! Look at the 3 cards at the top of the Draw Pile, but you can't hold on to them! Put them back in the same order and don't let your opponents take a glance!

cards.name: Draw from Bottom
cards.instruction: You get to pick a card from the bottom of the pile! Bottoms up ;)

cards.name: Shuffle
cards.instruction: You're now at the mercy of your opponents. Shuffle the Draw Pile until asked to stop; but no peeking!. Remember: this can save you from the dreaded Exploding Kittens...

cards.name: Skip
cards.instruction: Skip your chance and let the next player deal with the uncertainties of the deck.

cards.name: Attack
cards.instruction: Hehehe time to take your anger out on the next player! Force them to take two turns instead of one. Cheers :)

cards.name: Nope
cards.instruction:
You have been bestowed with a superpower. You now have the ability to stop an 'Attack' or a 'Favor' but not a Defuse Card or an Exploding Kitten Card. Imagine that any card (or Pair of Cat Cards) beneath a Nope Card no longer exists.
You can play a Nope Card at any time before an action has begun if it's your turn next. Any cards that have been noped are lost. They are left in the Discard Pile.
